constructionwand.chat.mode.default: Default - Extend your building on the side facing you
constructionwand.chat.mode.angel: Angel - Place behind blocks and in mid air
constructionwand.chat.lock.northsouth: North-South - Extend north and south from initial block. No building on north/south face
constructionwand.chat.lock.verticalnorth: North-South (+ Vertical) - Extend north, south, up and down from initial block. No building on north/south face
constructionwand.chat.lock.eastwest: East-West - Extend east and west from the initial block. No building on east/west face
constructionwand.chat.lock.verticaleastw: East-West (+ Vertical) - Extend east, west, up and down from the original block. No building on east/west face
constructionwand.chat.lock.horizontal: Horizontal - Extend left and right from the original block. No building on top/bottom face
constructionwand.chat.lock.vertical: Vertical - Extend up and down from the original block. No building on top/bottom face
constructionwand.chat.lock.nolock: None - Extend left, right, up and down from the original block
constructionwand.chat.direction.target: Target - Place blocks with same direction as target block
constructionwand.chat.direction.player: Player - Place blocks facing the player
constructionwand.chat.fluid.stopat: Stop - Stopped by fluid. Does not build through fluid of any kind
constructionwand.chat.fluid.ignore: Replace - Builds through fluid (both source blocks and flowing blocks)
